thread.title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte to send scout to watch Inter Milan star Ivan Perisic this weekend
thread.title_full: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte to send scout to watch Inter Milan star Ivan Perisic this weekend

author: gstonehouse
title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte to send scout to watch Inter Milan star Ivan Perisic this weekend
text:
Chelsea boss Antonio Conte to send scout to watch Inter Milan star Ivan Perisic this weekend 
Blues are set to run the rule over the attacker against Roma, according to reports Gossip Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SCOUTS from Chelsea will be at the San Siro this weekend to watch Inter Milan winger Ivan Perisic, according to reports. 
Antonio Conte is set to send his talent spotters to run the rule over the Croatia international against Roma on Sunday. Getty Images 4 Ivan Perisic is reportedly set to be watched by Chelsea this weekend against Roma 
Tuttomercatoweb are claiming that the Serie A giants could be willing to sell the 28-year-old to the Premier League leaders for £29.5million. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Chelsea news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
That claim comes despite the fact that Inter recently publicly declared their intent to keep Perisic at the club. 
Sporting director Piero Ausilio said: “I do not think it is either Perisic’s or our intentions for him to leave. 
“He is part of a massive project and we do not want to sell our players. Getty Images The Croatian attacker is believed to be available for £29.5m this summer Getty Images According to reports in his homeland, Chelsea boss Antonio Conte is plotting a move for the Croatian EPA 4 Ivan Perisic has bagged seven goals and provided six assists for Inter this season 
“We cannot envisage an Inter without Perisic. We are not going to get rid of our best players.” 
Inter brought the former Borussia Dortmund man to Italy in the summer of 2015, splashing out £16m to land him from Wolfsburg. 
He has appeared 29 times for the club this season, scoring seven goals and providing six assists. 
Perisic still has three-and-a-half years left to run on his contract at the San Siro. related articles Tottenham incredibly almost signed Diego Maradona - but pulled out because of his 'baggage' SIGH OF RELIEF John Stones 'thrilled to bits' to make amends by scoring in City's goalfest after defensive howler HUNG OUT TO PIE Celebs lead fans demanding Sutton keeper Wayne Shaw get his job back as he's SACKED by club for eating a pie in the dugout thanks to OTT novelty bet probe after club's Arsenal heroics NO GUNS ALLOWED North Ferriby 0 Lincoln 1: Arsenal scouts denied entry as their FA Cup quarter-final opponents keep promotion push on course LOTHAR’S LOWDOWN Sevilla are good enough to beat anyone on their day and I’m afraid they will be too good for Leicester Wolves 0-2 Chelsea : Chelsea cruise through to the quarter finals
